name.am: TwFollowExporter - የትዊተር ተከታዮችን ወደ ውጭ መላክ
name.bg: TwFollowExporter - експортиране на последователи в Twitter
name.ca: TwFollowExporter: exporta els seguidors de Twitter
name.fa: TwFollowExporter - دنبال کنندگان توییتر را صادر کنید
name.fil: TwFollowExporter - i-export ang mga tagasunod sa Twitter
name.ja: TwFollowExporter - Twitter フォロワーをエクスポートします
name.th: TwFollowExporter - ส่งออกผู้ติดตาม Twitter
name.vi: TwFollowExporter - xuất người theo dõi Twitter
name.zh_CN: TwFollowExporter - 导出 Twitter 关注者
name.zh_TW: TwFollowExporter - 匯出 Twitter 追蹤者

short.ar: أداة آلية لاستخراج المتابعين وقوائم المتابعة من Twitter/X إلى CSV أو Excel بنقرة واحدة.
short.am: ተከታዮችን ለማውጣት እና ከTwitter/X ወደ CSV ወይም Excel በአንድ ጠቅታ የሚከተሉ ዝርዝሮችን ለማውጣት አውቶማቲክ መሳሪያ።
short.bg: Автоматизиран инструмент за извличане на последователи и следващи списъци от Twitter/X в CSV или Excel с едно щракване.
short.bn: টুইটার/এক্স থেকে CSV বা এক্সেলে এক ক্লিকে ফলোয়ার এবং অনুসরণ করা তালিকা বের করার জন্য একটি স্বয়ংক্রিয় টুল।
short.ca: Una eina automatitzada per extreure seguidors i llistes de seguiment de Twitter/X a CSV o Excel amb un sol clic.
short.cs: Automatizovaný nástroj pro extrahování sledujících a seznamů sledujících z Twitteru/X do CSV nebo Excelu jediným kliknutím.
short.da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,he: An automated tool to extract followers and following lists from Twitter/X to CSV or Excel with one click.
short.de: Ein automatisiertes Tool zum Extrahieren von Followern und Followerlisten von Twitter/X in CSV oder Excel mit einem Klick.
short.el: Ένα αυτοματοποιημένο εργαλείο για εξαγωγή ακολούθων και λιστών από Twitter/X σε CSV ή Excel με ένα κλικ.
short.es: Una herramienta automatizada para extraer seguidores y listas de seguidores de Twitter/X a CSV o Excel con un solo clic.
short.et: Automatiseeritud tööriist jälgijate ja jälgitavate loendite eraldamiseks Twitterist/X-st CSV-sse või Excelisse ühe klõpsuga.
short.fa: ابزاری خودکار برای استخراج فالوورها و لیست های فالو از توییتر/X به CSV یا اکسل با یک کلیک.
short.fi: Automaattinen työkalu seuraajien ja seuraajien poimimiseen Twitter/X:stä CSV:hen tai Exceliin yhdellä napsautuksella.
short.fil: Isang awtomatikong tool upang kunin ang mga tagasunod at mga sumusunod na listahan mula sa Twitter/X hanggang CSV o Excel sa isang…
short.fr: Un outil automatisé pour extraire les abonnés et les listes de suivi de Twitter/X vers CSV ou Excel en un seul clic.
short.gu: એક ક્લિક સાથે Twitter/X થી CSV અથવા Excel સુધી અનુયાયીઓ અને ફોલોવર્સ લિસ્ટ્સ કાઢવા માટેનું સ્વયંસંચાલિત સાધન.
short.hi: एक क्लिक से ट्विटर/एक्स से सीएसवी या एक्सेल में फॉलोअर्स और फॉलोइंग सूचियां निकालने का एक स्वचालित उपकरण।
short.hr: Automatizirani alat za izdvajanje sljedbenika i popisa praćenja s Twittera/X u CSV ili Excel jednim klikom.
short.hu: Automatizált eszköz, amellyel egyetlen kattintással kinyerheti a követőket és a követési listákat a Twitter/X-ből CSV vagy Excel…
short.id: Alat otomatis untuk mengekstrak pengikut dan daftar berikut dari Twitter/X ke CSV atau Excel dengan satu klik.
short.it: Uno strumento automatizzato per estrarre follower ed elenchi di follower da Twitter/X a CSV o Excel con un clic.
short.ja: ワンクリックでTwitter/XからフォロワーやフォローリストをCSVやExcelに抽出する自動ツール。
short.kn: ಒಂದು ಕ್ಲಿಕ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ Twitter/X ನಿಂದ CSV ಅಥವಾ Excel ಗೆ ಅನುಸರಿಸುವವರನ್ನು ಮತ್ತು ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಪಟ್ಟಿಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊರತೆಗೆಯಲು ಸ್ವಯಂಚಾಲಿತ ಸಾಧನ.
short.ko: 한 번의 클릭으로 Twitter/X의 팔로어 및 팔로잉 목록을 CSV 또는 Excel로 추출하는 자동화된 도구입니다.
short.lt: Automatizuotas įrankis, leidžiantis vienu paspaudimu ištraukti pasekėjus ir sekančius sąrašus iš Twitter/X į CSV arba Excel.
short.lv: Automatizēts rīks, lai ar vienu klikšķi izvilktu sekotājus un sekojošus sarakstus no Twitter/X uz CSV vai Excel.
short.ml: ഒറ്റ ക്ലിക്കിലൂടെ Twitter/X-ൽ നിന്ന് CSV അല്ലെങ്കിൽ Excel-ലേക്ക് ഫോളോവേഴ്‌സ് എക്‌സ്‌ട്രാക്റ്റ് ചെയ്യാനും പിന്തുടരുന്ന ലിസ്‌റ്റുകൾ…
short.mr: Twitter/X वरून CSV किंवा Excel पर्यंत फॉलोअर्स आणि फॉलोअर्स काढण्यासाठी एक स्वयंचलित टूल एका क्लिकने.
short.ms: Alat automatik untuk mengekstrak pengikut dan senarai berikut daripada Twitter/X ke CSV atau Excel dengan satu klik.
short.nl: Een geautomatiseerde tool om met één klik volgers en volglijsten van Twitter/X naar CSV of Excel te extraheren.
short.no: Et automatisert verktøy for å trekke ut følgere og følgelister fra Twitter/X til CSV eller Excel med ett klikk.
short.pl: Zautomatyzowane narzędzie do wyodrębniania obserwujących i list obserwujących z Twittera/X do pliku CSV lub Excel za pomocą jednego…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Uma ferramenta automatizada para extrair seguidores e listas de seguidores do Twitter/X para CSV ou Excel com um clique.
short.ro: Un instrument automat pentru a extrage urmăritori și liste de urmărire de pe Twitter/X la CSV sau Excel cu un singur clic.
short.ru: Автоматизированный инструмент для извлечения подписчиков и списков подписчиков из Twitter/X в CSV или Excel одним щелчком мыши.
short.sk: Automatizovaný nástroj na extrahovanie sledovateľov a zoznamov sledovania z Twitter/X do CSV alebo Excelu jediným kliknutím.
short.sl: Samodejno orodje za ekstrahiranje sledilcev in seznamov sledenja iz Twitterja/X v CSV ali Excel z enim klikom.
short.sr: Аутоматски алат за издвајање пратилаца и листа праћења са Твиттер/Кс у ЦСВ или Екцел једним кликом.
short.sv: Ett automatiserat verktyg för att extrahera följare och följande listor från Twitter/X till CSV eller Excel med ett klick.
short.sw: Zana otomatiki ili kupata wafuasi na orodha zifuatazo kutoka Twitter/X hadi CSV au Excel kwa mbofyo mmoja.
short.ta: ஒரே கிளிக்கில் Twitter/X இலிருந்து CSV அல்லது Excel வரை பின்தொடர்பவர்கள் மற்றும் பின்வரும் பட்டியல்களைப் பிரித்தெடுக்க ஒரு…
short.te: ఒకే క్లిక్‌తో Twitter/X నుండి CSV లేదా Excel వరకు అనుచరులను మరియు క్రింది జాబితాలను సంగ్రహించడానికి స్వయంచాలక సాధనం.
short.th: เครื่องมืออัตโนมัติเพื่อแยกผู้ติดตามและรายการติดตามจาก Twitter/X เป็น CSV หรือ Excel ได้ในคลิกเดียว
short.tr: Takipçileri ve takip edilen listeleri tek tıklamayla Twitter/X'ten CSV veya Excel'e çıkarmaya yönelik otomatik bir araç.
short.uk: Автоматизований інструмент для отримання підписників і списків підписок із Twitter/X у CSV або Excel одним клацанням миші.
short.vi: Một công cụ tự động để trích xuất người theo dõi và danh sách theo dõi từ Twitter/X sang CSV hoặc Excel chỉ bằng một cú nhấp chuột.
short.zh_CN: 一种自动化工具，只需单击一下即可将关注者和关注列表从 Twitter/X 提取到 CSV 或 Excel。
short.zh_TW: 一種自動化工具，只需單擊即可將追蹤者和追蹤清單從 Twitter/X 提取到 CSV 或 Excel。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TwFollowExporter is designed for marketers, researchers, and social media enthusiasts. It allows you to seamlessly export comprehensive lists of followers or followings from any Twitter account directly into CSV or Excel formats. Now you can even export followers  and members from any Twitter List.

🗂️What you can export:
1.All Followers of a Specific User
2.All Verified Followers of a Specific User (Verified Followers have a blue, gold, or gray checkmark. These are all high-quality users.)
3.All Followings of a Specific User
4.All Followers of a Specific List
5.All Members of a Specific List

🙂How it works:
1.Enter the Twitter user's handle (e.g., @elonmusk) or a Twitter List URL (e.g., https://x.com/i/lists/1368738285263159296)
2.Choose the type of data you want to export: either Followers or Following.
3.Click the 'Start Export' button to begin the process.
4.You can use the History feature to view previous export records, continue interrupted exports, and regenerate CSV files from previous tasks.

🗎Sample CSV:
View the sample CSV here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1St7DyLW7tZVuXWXWpitSD6EsQnvFaw4Qe0zFabT4hLY/edit?usp=sharing

📋The exported CSV file includes these columns:
ID: The unique Twitter identifier for each user.
Handle: The @username associated with the Twitter profile.
Name: The full name displayed on the Twitter account.
Bio: A snapshot of the user's biography.
CanDM: Indicates the possibility of sending a direct message to the user.
Location: The geographical location provided by the user.
TotalFavouritesByUser: How many tweets the user has liked overall.
FollowersCount: The number of other Twitter users who have subscribed to this user.
FollowingCount: The number of other Twitter users this individual has subscribed to .
MediaCount: The number of media shares by the user.
ProfileBannerURL: Direct link to the user's banner image.
UserPageUrl: The URL to the user's Twitter page.
ProfileURL: The URL to the user's custom profile page.
AvatarURL: Link to the user's avatar image.
PostCount: The total number of tweets posted by the user.
Verified: Status indicating Twitter verification.
IsBlueVerified: Whether the account carries the blue verified badge.

🔒Data Privacy:
The safeguarding of user data is our top priority, and we are profoundly grateful for the confidence our users have in us. We are committed to adhering to all applicable privacy laws and regulations to ensure the utmost protection of user information. This includes rigorous compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other privacy mandates.

📘Disclaimer: 
Twitter is a registered trademark of Twitter, Inc. Please note that our browser extension, TwFollowExporter, functions autonomously and is not officially associated with or endorsed by Twitter.

✉️Contact us:
If you have any bug reports, feedback, or suggestions for improvement, please feel free to contact us anytime at xtcodetech@gmail.com.

Please note, TwFollowExporter is a freemium software. You can export up to 500 records per export for free. You need to upgrade to export unlimited records.
